transcript.title: Prime Minister Transcript of doorstop interview Sydney 4 December 2009
transcript.content:
PM: People of New South Wales are sick to death of fighting, infighting and divisions in the Government of New South Wales. I'm sick to death of fighting and infighting and divisions in the Government of New South Wales.

The time has come for the New South Wales Government to get its act together and to get on with governing for the people of New South Wales. I wish the new Premier well in meeting this formidable challenge.

The people of New South Wales are now expecting better government, and I would suggest that the new Premier of New South Wales get on with the job, and get on with the job as of today.

Thank you.
